Community Match Requirements

page.title:
Community Match Requirements
Community Match Requirements

DESCRIPTION OF OFP REQUIREMENT
DESCRIPTION OF OFP REQUIREMENT
page.normal_text:
CCG Program statutes require Grantees to match their grant funds with either dollar or measurable in-kind contributions. The purpose of the match requirement is to encourage Grantees to secure ongoing commitment and support from community agencies and businesses, and to encourage community collaboration.
CCG Program statutes require Grantees to match their grant funds
with either dollar or measurable in-kind contributions. The purpose of w i t h

page.title:
AMOUNT REQUIRED (Minimum Levels)
AMOUNT REQUIRED
(Minimum Levels)
page.enlisting:
1st Year 10% of the grant amount. 2nd Year 15% for the second year grant amount. 3rd Year 20% for the third through subsequent years of the grant. 1st Year 10% of the grant amount.

Previously funded CCG projects will be required to maintain their in-kind support level at the 20 percent level during the current grant term.

page.title:
Recommended Documentation
Recommended Documentation
page.normal_text:
If applicable, the letter should state if the donation is a qualified tax deduction.
If applicable, the letter should state if the donation is a qualified tax
deduction.
page.enlisting:
